title: Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space
title_jp: 機動戦士ガンダムⅢ　めぐりあい宇宙編
synopsis: The One Year War comes to a close, as the Zeon forces now retreat back into space. Amuro learns much more of his Newtype abilities and tries to use them the best way he can. He's pushed to his limit as he encounters the infamous Char Aznable once again. He also falls in love with a mysterious woman named Lalah Sune, who knows the full potential of the Newtype abilities.
